name: Z/ZERO
description:
!! The first level is not finished !!

You are the first zombie. You don't have to be the last.

The Project : 

You play as a mad scientist who wants to exterminate all humans by transforming into a zombie.

You will need to observe humans before your transformation to make sure you don't forget any.

If when you are a zombie you die, you can take control of the last human you killed. you will be a new zombie.

Graphic Limitation for Pixel Art :
  • NES colors
  • Canvas resolution : 256 X 240 
  • 4 colors by sprites (and by object or character)
